CustomField.description: Created as part of BIZ-45145. Modified as part of BIZ-49348, to include Existing Client. Modified as part of BIZ-50639 , to remove reference of SOW Document Attatched.
CustomField.formula: OR( Existing_Client__c, ISPICKVAL(Software_Payment_Terms__c, 'Other'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__BillingFrequency__c, 'Invoice Plan'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__BillingFrequency__c, 'Other'), NOT(ISBLANK(Billing_Restriction__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Shipping_Restriction__c)), MSSA_Document_Attached__c, Cloud_Addendum_Document_Attached__c, Liability_Annex_Document_Attached__c, SBQQ__Account__r.Pre_9_4_1_Liability_Annex_Executed__c, ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.1.1'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.2'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.2.1'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.2.2'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '8.5'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '8.8'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '8.9'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.0'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.1'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.2'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.3'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.4'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '9.4v3'), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.6 excluding Cloud Terms'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.7 excluding Cloud Terms'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.8 Excluding Cloud Terms'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '10.9 Excluding Cloud Terms'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, '11 Excluding Cloud Terms') ), ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.Cloud_Addendum__c) ), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'New Intapp MSSA Attached'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Existing Intapp MSSA Plus Cloud'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Existing Intapp MSSA plus Annex'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Repstor Legacy'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'OnePlace Legacy'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Existing Intapp MSSA signed by Customer Affiliate'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Trial'), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'New MSSA Signed Separate'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Status__c,'Verification Approved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Ship_To_Account__r.Status__c,'Verification Approved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Account__r.Status__c,'Verification Approved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Ship_To_Address__r.Status__c,'Verification Approved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Address__r.Status__c,'Verification Approved')), AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Contract_Term_Version__c, 'Legacy DealCloud MSA'), SBQQ__NetAmount__c - DealCloud_Total_Year1__c >= 0, SBQQ__NetAmount__c - DealCloud_Total_Year1__c <> Services_Net_Total__c ), ISPICKVAL(Contract_Master_Terms__c, 'Custom Master Term from Account') )
CustomField.label: Require Ops Support
